attachments.fallback: [January 7th, 2021 8:13 PM] simeondavidschaub99: Using nightly in VS Code, I frequently see precompile getting stuck with apparently 3 further packages to precompile left, but it doen't say which packages and just freezes with no further output. Any ideas wher to start debugging? A random guess would be that VS Code might load additional packages for the languageserver, that are not in the environment, which might confuse Pkg?
attachments.text: Using nightly in VS Code, I frequently see precompile getting stuck with apparently 3 further packages to precompile left, but it doen't say which packages and just freezes with no further output. messages.text: Turns out it was just a corruption in a package folder, so completely unrelated to VS Cde
